attributes.action: introduce legislation to compel the State to take full responsibility for the maintenance and improvement of ancient Church of England buildings for worship and community use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small Church of England congregations bear the whole responsibility for maintaining historic Anglican parish churches at the heart of most English communities. Government support, as in France, would enable the many who benefit from these buildings to maintain them for worship and, importantly,to develop them for community use.
